articles.content:
Russian Social Committee Formed 
    Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- A Russian social committee was formed in Moscow on January 20 to celebrate the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.
 A statement on the formation of the committee said Kim Jong Il has earned great fame everywhere on the planet as a world-renowned genius, the most outstanding strategist, statesman and brilliant commander and the great leader of the heroic people who is successfully carrying into reality a far-reaching plan for building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation in the time-honored land of Korea.    
 Noting that he is well known and respected in the Russia public, too, it said his birthday is a grand and joyful fete. 
 The committee is made up with Vladimir Tolstikov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, as its chairman, and Oleg Shenin, chairman of the Soviet Communist Party, Sazhi Umalatova, chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, and 26 others as members.
